column7: Multiple issues, see the following lines
Tried to build libgomp with correct symbols. Gave up and used ubuntu binary distribution. Libgomp is used inside KLEE for parallelization using openMP

Tried using nixpkgs LLVM for s2e-llvm. Gave up after realizing they have incompatible LLVM feature flags. This would've sped up the build otherwise, from 7GB to 2GB disk usage for the amba installation.
General work on trying to make `amba run` usable. Still some thinigs left to figure out before being able to load a binary and run the guest.
